Tests that svg:style does not crash when the related element is inspected.

 Main style:
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded] 
rect { (svg-style.xhtml:38 -> svg-style.xhtml:38:16)
    fill: red;

[expanded] 
svg:rect[Attributes Style] { ()

[expanded] 
* { (user agent stylesheet)
    transform-origin: 0px 0px 0px;
